name: Palak Oza
description: I am a B.E. in Computer Engineering specializing in computer vision and LiDAR data analysis. My experience includes developing ML models focusing on detection, segmentation, and explainability to enhance operational insights and performance.

name: Sakshi Srivastava
description: I am a BTech student in CSE at AKTU. I am working on Explainable AI methods for Computer Vision and Drone use cases for Maharashtra Drone Mission. My research  focus is ML model development and Image Segmentation.

name: Himanshu Patil
description: I am a B.E in Computer Engineering student. My background involves research in Computer Vision, NLP and Generative AI.

name: Saurbh Singh Jamwal
description: Student of MS by Research in CSE Department, IIT Bombay. My area of research is Computer Vision. Currently working on Image generation and Image processing techniques. Interested in combining Robotics and Artificial Intelligence.

name: Vikram Bansal
description: Project scientist at MDM project. I did my MS in Biomedical Engineering, specializing in Biomechanics from University of texas, Austin. I am currently persuing my PhD from IIT Bombay.

name: Ajoy Raj
description: Assistant Project Manager at MDM project. I did B.Sc in Mathematics from Mumbai University and MBA in International Business from ICFAI University

name: Om Wagh
description: I am a B.E in E&Tc with honours in Data Science. I have worked upon Explainable AI methods and currently working to build a model for Identification of Internal Human Injury.

name: Nissim Kurle
description: Nissim, an MSc graduate in Data Science and Analytics from Cardiff University, is passionate about mathematical problem-solving and advanced computational research. His interests include the Shortest Vector Problem (SVP) and polynomial factorization over rational coefficients, which he explored in depth in his MSc dissertation. With a keen eye for innovation, he enjoys tackling complex challenges in mathematics and computing.
